title: Sri Lanka hopes to reduce power cuts after April 02 Indian diesel ship
body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka hopes to reduce power cuts from April 02, with the arrival of a diesel ship from India, Power Minister Pavithra Wanniarchchi said.
“A ship under the Indian credit line will arrive on the night of April 01. The Ceylon Electricity Board will get fuel from April 02.
Power Ministry Secretary M M C Ferdinandez said on April 04, a furnace oil ship is also expected.
